ygData.subject: RE: Well I think it is a new item for jewelers if any o ut there
ygData.msgSnippet: That someone is Macneal Jacob (sp?) he is on duty in the backroom.  With so much traffic going through there, you d think that he would be [running low] - next
ygData.messageBody:
That someone is Macneal Jacob (sp?) he is on duty in the backroom. With so
much traffic going through there, you'd think that he would be [running low]
- next time you are there - ask him about his inventory and see if he is
[low] - hehe.

Sylly.

p.s. you can get 2 quests in one done with this trail. You just need to
know which ranger in Surefall Glade gets the gnoll head - but once you have
Gnasher's head I think you can just axe around til you find the right one.
Also - u can read the notes that you get handed by giving them a quick right
click - interesting info sometimes.

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 10:45 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Well I think it is a new item
for jewelers if any out there

From: John Kim <kim@...>

On Wed, 4 Aug 1999, Thomas Mahn wrote:

> get a moonstone. Now this is a
> new item to me and all the jewelers in town at the time. I
> did not let them know how to obtain because aminly , THEY
> WERE NOT BARDS heheheheh. But i sold two fer 10 plat a
> piece.

If you turn them in to someone at the bar where Trumpy
Irontoe
hangs out, you can get yourself a flask of the banned
Blackburrow Stout. Why did these folks pay 10pp for them?
As far as I know there's no jewelery you can make from them
(though I'm not a jeweler).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
